cause.description:
To those of you who have a HEART, please take a look at this site www.myspace.com/savethemoonbears
Please help spread the word about how these Bears are suffering and why they are left to suffer in conditions such as these. They are called Moon Bears because they have a cresent shape moon on their tummys.
These bears are captured for the use of their spleen, China, Korea, Japan, Thai Land are just some of the countries that Abuse these Animals. They Cut a massive hole in there Stomach and drain a substance called Vile out of them, To do this they are placed in a tiny cage to live in for the rest of there life until they die. The wound in there stomach is left open as it need's to be for the ABUSERS to drain what they need from them.
Each Bear is used for about 9 years and as soon as it's not producing anymore substance these wicked Devil people brutally murder them and throw them away.
For Those who have a HEART please go on this site: www.myspace.com/savethemoonbears
We need you to send messages to the account stating your opinion. Just follow myspace simple instructions and make your account so you can drop this site a message.
Thankyou so much for your helP.
1. Please help give these bears a chance to escape their abusers.
